roleset.name: putting into new words

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Yet , unlike the others , I-1 am not starting a new thread *PRO*-1 to reword the same old points .

example.name: All args
example.text: i reworded it as "Chosen actions" I meant she purposefully performed the actions, not purposefully.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to 'rewording-n.01'. No VNcls.
